item.title: Hum
item.description:
经济学人推荐新书：《哼》

内容简介 · · · · · ·

Helen Phillips/著，Hum（中译：《哼》）. Marysue Rucci Books出版; 272 pages; $27.99. Atlantic Books出版; £16.99

一部关于人工智能的扣人心弦的科幻小说抓住了人类的意义。《哼》唤起了一种令人感到诡异现实的技术反乌托邦。

item.title: 哈佛商业评论•人工智能必读10本书
item.description:
《哈佛商业评论•人工智能必读10本书》

作者：Harvard Business Review 出版社：Ascent Audio 主题领域：Artificial Intelligence (AI)

内容简介 · · · · · ·

The next generation of AI is here - use it to lead your business forward.

item.title: 中国人工智能进步加速，正缩小与美国差距
item.description:
China Is Closing the A.I. Gap With the United States

MEAGHAN TOBIN, CADE METZ

At the World Artificial Intelligence Conference in Shanghai this month, start-up founder Qu Dongqi showed off a video he had recently posted online. It displayed an old photograph of a woman with two toddlers. Then the photo sprang to life as the woman lifted the toddlers up in her arms and they laughed with surprise.
